-- original file in csv with customer name
SELECT
    TOP 10 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://datalakevipaiva.dfs.core.windows.net/files/labs-dp-203/06/data/**',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0', HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]


-- file after the transformation in the notebook using Spark , slit the name to First and Last name and delete the original column
SELECT
    TOP 10 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://datalakevipaiva.dfs.core.windows.net/files/labs-dp-203/06/transformed_data/orders.parquet/**',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
